name: Size&Shape
description:
SIZE & SHAPE

Size&Shape is a hole in the wall game where the objective is to make a shape that perfectly fits the wall approaching you. The max score at the end is 310, Good Luck! 

The lighting works better in the build so please download if you want CRISP shadows :D

CONTROLS

  • LMB + Move                               = Move the object
  • RMB + Move Left or Right       = Rotate the object
  • Scroll wheel                              = Scale the object
  • Space bar                                 = Speed up the wall

ALTERNATE CONTROLS

  • Q                                                = Rotate left
  • E                                                = Rotate right

TEAM MEMBERS

  • Cameron Howell   -   Artist
  • Nick Allen            -   Programmer
  • Trent Stabler      -   Music
